name: Annex apartment - with great deck!
summary: Our cute and comfortable one bedroom apartment is a true Annex gem.  We are centrally located on a quiet tree lined street just steps away from vibrant Bloor Street. Enjoy our beautiful treetop patio, easy access to subways, and lots of restaurants and shops!
space: Great place located in the wonderful Annex. It's a hip neighbourhood with a lot of great restaurants.  Conveniently located a 5 minute walk from both Spadina and St. George subway stations. Apartment is on the 3rd floor (walk up) of an old turn of the century house with lots of character. name: Best luxury location in downtown Toronto!
space: Luxury & Best location in Toronto! NOTE: SUITE ONLY AVAILABLE FOR LONG TERM STAY. THANK YOU My apartment is all around amazing! It is fully furnished and the location is fantastic because it's in the heart of downtown, in the financial district, right on the streetcar line, next to Harbourfront and 10 minutes to anywhere downtown! It's a 1 bedroom apartment with a separate living room and kitchen area that you can entertain or relax in. The bathroom is well-sized and the entire place is about 562 sq. feet of pure luxury! There's a queen size bed in the bedroom and an inflatable queen size mattress that can be pulled out from my closet if there are two extra guests that want to bunk in comfort in the living room. The apartment has a washer/dryer, dishwasher, stove, microwave, refrigerator, dishes, cooking pots, cutlery, towels, etc - fully stocked apartment.  The building is fairly new and has amazing amenities, including a gym, pool, bbq terrace, steam room, hot tub/jacuzzi, pool table

name: Sunny & Stylish Aprtmnt w easy access to dwntwn
summary: You can sleep up to 3 people in this bright, newly renovated, 800 square foot  apartment, featuring 7 windows and high (9') ceilings in the main area.  It's just an 11 min drive to downtown, 10 mins drive to the beach, 5 mins walk to a park with playground and running trails.   Save your money by staying in this quiet, safe neighbourhood with easy access to downtown and all the sights.
space: Separate side entrance leads you into a big, bright main living room featuring 2 sofas and a pull-out single bed.  The space further opens into a split-level (6' 7") fully equipped kitchen including stove, refrigerator, and  dining table. Through the bedroom door you find a spacious single bedroom with a comfortable double bed, as well as the ensuite bathroom (with standing shower). This cool space also features a number of unique artifacts, including a dart board, a vintage record player, an art deco desk, an early 19th century label maker, and a collection of handcrafted artisan fish decoys.

name: pleasant apt, centrally located
space: Spacious, sunny, modern and clean apt. in mid town Toronto. My home is located  in a very safe and beautiful area close to all public transit and walking distance to stores, restaurants, parks. For those who enjoy  arts/culture or club scene, a short subway ride will take you to the centre of Toronto where you will find museums, trendy Queen St. and many unique neighborhoods such as Little Italy, Kensington Market and China town.   If you are a nature lover, a short walk will take you to one of the wonderful walking trails that run through the city but you feel like you are in the woods! Apt. includes washer and dryer and fresh linen and towels are supplied.  Visitors have use of kitchen for breakfast and or light meals but no heavy cooking after 8:00 p.m.  Also, it is expected that you will clean up after you have used the kitchen. name: Beautiful 3 Bedroom Home in Little Italy!
summary: Location! Enjoy this gorgeous family home in this hot Little Italy Toronto neighbourhood. Take this opportunity to come live, work or play in the amazingly diverse city of Toronto.
space: Available in the fantastic neighborhood of Little Italy in downtown Toronto is a 3 bedroom & 2 bath home. Our home is on a great tree-lined street. Enjoy the gorgeous backyard lounge outside this little Italy family home in a central location with all of the amenities you need to explore the city  (Centre Island, Art Gallery of Ontario, Royal Ontario Museum). We're located just up the street from trendy College Street and the culinary delights on Ossington Ave., plus this house is very close to several neighborhood parks and central to the rest of the city and Greater Toronto Area. name: Warm Family Home Downtown Toronto
space: Our home is fully renovated in the heart of one of Toronto's best Downtown neighbourhoods named "Little Portugal". Minutes to West Queen West (Design District), Bustling Ossington Street, and Little Italy. Great restaurants, bars, boutiques and shops literally steps from our front door. It's Toronto's hippest neighbourhood by far.  Our three bedroom home is a Victorian that's been renovated so it's open concept, contemporary, bright and airy. Rooms are big and comfortable. Modern kitchen for cooking great meals. Wood floors throughout, high ceilings and exposed brick.  Upstairs are three bedrooms, one with a Queen bed, one with a single bed, and one with two single beds that can easily be pushed together for a double. All are functional with warm, stylish decor. The bathroom has a shower and bathtub and is on the second floor. Public transit is steps away on Dundas Street. Wireless throughout. .

name: Downtown Toronto Near Lake Ontario
summary: We are located 1 block from the Distillery District and 3 blocks from the St. Lawrence Market. We are within walking to most all attractions Downtown Toronto, including the CN Tower, Rogers Center, Queens Quay, Ripley's Aquarium, Toronto Eaton Center, etc. very well serviced by Public Transportation. We are but 15 minute walk to Union Station and UP Express to Pearson Airport.
space: We rent a private room to visitors and students visiting Canada. Shared bath, kitchen, BBQ and laundry. Wireless Internet. We are a Gay couple (not looking for any funny business), one of us is fluent in Spanish, the other only English. We have three Chihuahua's who live in the house with us. We have pictures of the inside and outside of the house. Just minutes (walking) from the heart of the city and minutes (walking) from Lake Ontario.  No curfew as we are up to 1:00am most nights.

name: 2 Bedroom UofT, OCAD, Queen West, Exceptional Loft
summary: This is a unique building with a loft style that you do not find easily in Toronto anymore.  The unit is full of character, in a trendy and easy to access area.   2 bedrooms, 1 furnished, 1 unfurnished (this can be negotiated) Equipped with SmartTV, WIFI, 2 separate bedrooms this is a great spot for a education stay.  Or, for a working professional. .   The hard wood floors, large kitchen island and high ceilings offer a spacious feel.
space: This is a 1000-square foot, 2 bedroom and accommodate up to 4 people.   This is a character building in the heart of downtown with a great vibe.  The building can get slightly noisy but ultimately it's a great spot to get out and see things day or night. On the Queen west strip you'll be within walking distance of plenty of boutiques, cafés, restaurants and galleries. Ossington, Trinity Bellwoods, Kensington Market, Chinatown are all a 10-minute walk.  Further along you'll find the Drake and Gladstone Hotels hosting live performances daily.  Clubs, restaurants and the theatre district of Mirvish King West & Jays, Raptor, & Leafs are all within 10minutes by UBER.   Quick to jump on Queen or King streetcars, and the Bathurst streetcar TTC is a simple step away, surrounded by bike kiosks, and bike lanes, as well as local underground parking.  Fast access to TTC subway lines.  Wherever you cannot stroll to you are never more than a 10-15-minute taxi ride away or a quick hop on the streetca

space: Don't rent 2 hotel rooms, keep the family together or house 2 professionals lavishly with a beautiful 1,100 square foot luxury suite in the trendy heart of the Entertainment District in downtown Toronto surrounded by the Financial District, Harbourfront, Liberty Village, and the Fashion District. name: Experience Downsview Park
summary: My place is close to public transport, parks, and art and culture and Yorkdale, one of the most prestigious shopping malls.  You’ll love my place because of the location, the outdoors space, the ambiance, and the views. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. The room is versatile and can be used as a seminar room or a bedroom. The bathroom and the fully equipped kitchen are on the same level.
space: For people who want to give a seminar, the seminar room  is suitable for up to 30 people. People can rent it without the sleeping quarters for a day or an evening.  It is a very flexible room. This space would provide sleeping quarters on a pull out double bed futon couch in the private seminar room. No-smoking. Quiet neighborhood.  Access to backyard described as a zen garden. Across the street from a huge park (Downsview) for walking, events, etc.. Close to public transit. Access to cable, internet, parking, kitchen, seminar room for giving seminars. Guests will have their own kitchen and bathroom and bedroom. We are across the street from Downsview Park. There are walking trails, a small lake and events that take place there. Also walking distance to another park with lots of trees. The Keele bus is 4 doors away and by next year we will be walking distance to the new subway that is being built. Right now the subway is a 10 minutes bus ride away. That takes you to downtown Toronto.

name: Sunlit Separate Entrance Apartment
summary: This house has it all! Located in a great neighbourhood (major intersection Bathurst & St. Clair) with great indie shops, located close to the metro and a great grocery store. Enjoy being close to downtown but away from the hustle and bustle.
space: Welcome to our home! We hope that we can make your stay an enjoyable one. We offer a quiet, cozy 1-bedroom apartment with private access situated in a great neighbourhood. The apartment is totally separate from the rest of the house and there is no shared space.  Located in Toronto’s West End, you are 10-12 minutes away from the St. Clair West subway station (Yellow line) which takes you downtown.  Also nearby is a large grocery store, a pharmacy, and several shops/restaurants for all your travelling needs. For those with a car, we do have one free parking space. If you're interested in weekend Farmer's Markets, nearby is the Wychwood Barns Farmer's Market year-round on Saturdays from 8:00 am to 1:00 pm. Lots of great local produce and unique gift ideas.  Being a native Torontonian, I am always keen to provide loads of fun things to do in the city be it sightseeing, dining-out, or touring Toronto’s great neighbourhoods.  KEY FEATURES:  * Fully equipped kitchen (oven, microwave, toaster

name: Beaches House
space: Beautifully renovated semi-detached house in charming Beaches neighbourhood. Great location. Close to beach, boardwalk, Kew Gardens, bike path, streetcar, groceries, pubs, restaurants, library, book stores. Ten minutes to lakeshore film studios. A great place to relax and enjoy the neighbourhood, the parks, the waterfront, with easy access to downtown by car or streetcar. Wood-burning fireplace in living room, fully equipped open-concept kitchen & dining room, large luxurious master bedroom with high ceiling, walk-in closet and King size bed, second bedroom with Queen size bed. Both beds Serta Perfect Sleeper. Heated floors throughout, laundry, AC, dishwasher, front porch, private rear deck, Weber BBQ. WiFi, Plasma HDTV, PVR, iPod dock, 5.1 audio in living room, stereo audio in dining & bedooms, local phone. Wool carpets. Linens, dishware, Le Creuset cookware. Non-smoking.  Designed and built by Bart Szoke Architect.

name: 2 bd Apt at Yonge & Bloor Yorkville
summary: 2 bedroom Condo at Yonge & Bloor  in the heart of Yorkville and walking distance from the University of Toronto. Available  Furnished  and fully equipped.
space: 840 sqft condo at the 27th floor with amazing views of the city including CN Tower, Casa Loma, Lake Ontario and breathtaking sunsets. Fully equiped kitchen, hardwood floors, floor to ceiling windows and wrap around balcony. Light blocking, noise and heat reducing curtains in both bedrooms. The Master bedroom has a Queen size bed and the second bedroom a Full/Double. Amenities available in the 5th floor include outdoor pool, hot tub, BBQ area, indoors lounge with wifi, media room, billiards, & fitness room.  Located at the corner of Yonge & Bloor, you're minutes away from the city's best shopping. The Yorkville district of Toronto is known for it's designer and luxury shopping, trendy restaurants and art galleries.  Walk to the University of Toronto, Manulife Centre, Bloor st Shopping and the Royal Ontario Museum. The main subway hub of Yonge-Bloor is across the street from the condo. From the subway, you can access everything in Toronto, like the Eaton Centre, Sports venues, concerts a

name: Designer's Home: Huge, sunny 2 bdr Roncesvalles
summary: Huge, sunny, stylish & quiet 2 bedroom flat. Located in a heritage building in Roncesvalles, a popular area packed with boutiques, cafes, bars, & parks.  Near Queen W., the lake, High Park & 10 min. to downtown; there's a 24 hr. streetcar stop nearby.  My 1000 sq. ft. home has high ceilings, loads of natural light, comfy beds, quality linens & good vibes.  I speak French and some Spanish. Happy travels.
space: Hello! Bonjour! Hola! My flat is in a wonderful old brick heritage building built in 1903. The place is 1000 sq. ft. with 13 foot ceilings and large bay windows - all south-facing which brings in lots of sunshine. It has 2 bedrooms, living room, dining room, 1 bathroom, eat-in kitchen and a large foyer.  The place is very clean, spacious, and sunny.  High speed WIFI throughout the apt. There are nice linens and towels in the bedrooms and bathroom. The flat has hardwood floors, and tiles in the bathroom and kitchen. The building has the charm and feel of an older European building. The neigbourhood called Roncesvalles (pronounced Ron-says-Vale) is a great area with lots of cafes, bakeries, bars, cheese shops, antique stores and the oldest cinema in Canada. It's a 5 minute walk to Lake Ontario, 2 blocks to High Park (400 acres park with rivers and trails). Parkdale is 5 minutes away and The Gladstone Hotel is about 20 minutes by foot. To get downtown, it's 20 minute direct street car to

name: Modern, Clean & Quiet 2bd @ High Park
summary: Modern and clean 2 bedroom in the Junction
space: We have a large duplex  and it has 2 apartments. I live in one, and  the other is the unit you will be staying in!  This clean and cozy 2 bedroom apartment  is fully furnished.  It has a comfy double-size bed, down duvet, soft linens, clean pillows + a single comfy bed in a separate (URL HIDDEN) own 3 pieces private washroom and a lovely kitchen, fully equipped with stove top, refrigerator, microwave, pots and pans, cutlery, dishes, coffee maker, toaster, TV, WiFi, ceiling Fan, AC, iron and fresh towels and linens. Located in the Junction a very safe community, within close proximity to High Park and High Park subway with a bus stop right in front of our house. The Junction is an awesome community full of restaurants, shops and cafes.  Our location scores an impressive 93 out of 100 on the walkability score.   - 3 large supermarket 5 minutes way - 2 buses right in front of house, taking you to High Park Station or Dundas West Station -  High Park in walking distance - Downtown Toronto

name: 1 Bedroom Apt on Bloor-Danforth subway line!
summary: 2 minute walk from Subway gets you downtown in 20 minutes! Lots of shops and amenities within a 5 minute walk. Fully equipped with appliances including espresso/cappuccino maker!
space: Stylish, clean, spacious, and quiet basement apartment available. It is tastefully furnished with comfortable, modern furniture. There are windows in every room, and new flooring throughout.  Complete kitchen includes: - full-size stove/oven exhausted to outside - refrigerator - toaster oven - microwave - espresso/cappuccino maker - pots, pans dishes, cutlery, spices -- everything you need! Full bathroom with tub & shower. TV in living room and bedroom. Large 7' closet in bedroom. Double bed, lots of cozy comforters and linens.  Super Convenient Location: - 2 minute walk to Victoria Park subway. (Bloor line) - 5 minute walk to Shoppers World Danforth: Metro grocery store,  Shoppers Drug Mart, Dollarama, Bulk Barn, Lowes.  - Also walking distance to Loblaws, Freshco (cheapest grocery store of the 3), Canadian Tire, Main Go Station.  - 2 minute walk to the Beer Store and the Liquor Store. - 30 minute walk to the Beach, with its unique cafés & restaurants - lots of nature trails nearby -

name: Simplicity-Quiet Room in a House in the Kingsway
summary: Bright, quiet and comfortable room in Sunnylea (The Kingsway Villiage). 5 min walk to Transit/Subway, Restaurants, Starbucks and Shops. 10 min drive to  downtown Toronto and 15 mins to Pearson Airport. Gives you the best of both city life and a quite, tranquil  escape.
space: Quite house nestled in an old established and affluent neighborhood, close to many restaurants and pubs, only 10 mins to DT Toronto, 3 mins to the lake and 10 mins to the Airport. Large private backyard deck with outdoor kitchen and bbq are also available for private use. Parking included. Located on the main subway line to downtown Toronto, Royal York station is 5 min walk. Also very close to cinespace film studio (Website hidden by Airbnb)

name: Beautiful Newly Renovated 2BDM Home
space: Beautiful Two Bedroom home in the up and coming neighborhood of Parkdale/Dundas West. Newly renovated home with two bedrooms and two bathrooms. First bedroom is a Double bed with great afternoon sun and the second bedroom is a Queen with 32" Flat Screen TV/DVD player. There is also a TV in the Family Room with surround sound and Ipod Dock/Charger. Everything is for the most part new withing the past 1 year. WIFI BBQ Park across the street Brand new Gourmet Chefs Kitchen with Gas Stove and all the Spices and kitchen tools you will need. Air Conditioning One of the best features is the Amazing Backyard Garden Oasis with shaded Dining area along with the Newly Renovated Front Yard for people watching and sipping a glass of wine.

name: Boutique living - King West Central
space: Longer term tenants with 6+ month living requirements will be given special pricing. Please email dates and stay preferences. Long weekend, special event and film festival prices will vary.  900 sq feet -  loft living in downtown Toronto. Stunning boutique loft in King West Central. Open space concept with one bedroom and den. 10 ft ceilings, concrete floor and ceiling. An interior designers dream. Fully furnished with designer pieces. Wifi, satelite tv available. Located in trendy King west area near Thomson hotel and TIFF Bell lightbox. Whether you are a foodie or a movie buff, this is the place to be. A foodies dream come true with restaurants like Buca, Wurst, Susur, Kiwi, Paese, Jacob Steak House, Spoke Club and Spice Route a stone throw away. Located next to subways and streetcars. name: Riverdale 2 Bedroom Pied-de-Terre
summary: Location! Great view of  Withrow Park and the Toronto skyline. The park has 2 playgrounds, tennis, soccer, hockey and wading pool.  Close to Danforth which is full of shops and restaurants and to the subway. Charming living room and kitchen. This pied-de-terre feels like a retreat with it's park like setting and view of the city. It's a full apartment with laundry and separate entrance. There's a small den with a table.
space: Two bedroom apartment in the basement of a house. It is a quiet house. There is a beautiful garden in the front of the house and help yourself to greens and veggies from our garden in the back. Lovely living room with a fireplace and fully stocked kitchen.

The apartment is in the basement of the house. The entrance is through the back door. You likely won't see anyone. Riverdale and the Danforth is famous for it's parks, restaurants and shops. name: Location, Location downtown Toronto
summary: This Victorian style house is located on one of a few residential streets just steps from the downtown. Close to shopping , the theatre and business area, subway and the Gay Village. Wifi and laundry included. It fills up quickly so book ahead.
space: Cozy room on one the closest residental streets closest to downtown. Victorian style house. Kitchen access can be arranged. Airport pickup can be arranged if I am available during your arrival time and is an extra charge.  The room is a moderately sized bedroom with a double bed. There is a washroom between that bedroom and the kitchen. The neighbourhood is diverse with Yonge St a block away with the shops, hospitals, restaurants and the business section further south. All amenities close by and also close to Ryerson and University of Toronto. Clean towels are included and bar soap. We try to make this a fragrance free household. If you use please use fragrances sparingly. If your stay is more that two weeks access for cleaning will be required. .

name: BEST VIEW in the City! Luxury condo
summary: View of Lake and Cityscape!  Walking distance to historic cabbage town, the shops of Yorkville. Enjoy your own balcony in the sky, and a complete city view of Toronto in a modern but cozy 2 bedroom condo.  Gym access included!
space: Welcome to my home. I hope you will enjoy the condo and your visit to Toronto! Your stay in this condo in the sky offers you the best views of the city. During the night from the 33rd floor you see the postcard view of the twinkling Toronto city scape and CN Tower. During the day, the focus becomes the view of Lake Ontario and the Toronto Islands. This Downtown designer furnished condo comes complete  with a reserved underground parking space. The condo has two bedrooms. The Condo is situated a minute walk to the heart of Church/Wellesley Street, and a 10 minute walk to the fashionable Bloor St stores. The condo is located near the Hazelton shopping district, the trendy Yorkville area and historic Cabbage Town.   The apartment is fully furnished with modern yet comfortable furniture, fixtures and art.  It was recently designed and rennovated with wood paneling, built in bench, and a communal table for dining. name: Upscale 2bed Downtown Toronto-lake
summary: The most beautiful and desired area on Toronto’s Harborfront. Live right downtown without the downtown madness, in your own private hideaway with lake & downtown views, steps to entertainment & financial districts, parks, Exhibition place.
space: The most beautiful and desired area on Toronto’s' Harborfront. Live right downtown without the downtown madness! name: Elegant Private Room Condo-Downtown
summary: Upscale private room and private washroom right in the heart of downtown Toronto.   Please note this is a shared space with the owner (me), but I work 7am - 7pm and wont be home during the day!  Located in the upscale - Yorkville area
space: Overview: You will have your own private bedroom, private balcony and private attached bathroom.  Also included is WiFi, refreshments/granola bars, and  freshly washed towels and linens. name: URBAN OASIS quiet, bright, open concept w/ parking
summary: Your entire upper floor of coachhouse feels like an open concept artist loft in a city cabin with it's tree canopies, natural light and international Art. You'll have sound sleeps in comfort + quiet. Residential street safe to stroll day or night. 8 min walk to great choices in restos, shopping and transit. Quick taxi to Skydome & Union station. Bike rental on the street & close to bike paths. I've lovingly created a tidy & relaxing space to share with friends and family - and now you!
space: A free standing coach-house, your upper floor unit has a rustic Boho feel with it's slanted open wood beam ceiling and Contemporary and folk art from my international travels. My friends have nicknamed the unit as: "the treehouse" due to it's surrounding green canopy. I marvel at the good fortune of the unusual quiet for being so close to downtown action - plus no near or adjacent home you won't be disturbed and you won't disturb anyone.  The main floor of the coach-house is my live/work studio but guests enjoy complete privacy - you won't even know I'm there. Outdoor access (where smoking is permitted) is both from upper floor metal landing plus ground floor walk out garden sitting space. EXTRAS Though this upper floor is set up for guests it's also my part-time residence so some personal items are available for your enjoyment: books, decent wine glasses, nice serving dishes and indoor plants. I can't take credit for the exquisite light at dusk but it's all yours! UNIQUE THINGS: SHAPE

name: Two bedroom apt. in lovely house
summary: My home is a French Country style building in Roncesvalles which is a two bedroom apartment on the 2nd & 3rd floors fully furnished with wifi, laundry and parking.  Master bedroon has a queen bed and the second bedroom has a double bed. The sofa converts to a bed available for extra guests. I do not rent often as this is my home, (only when I am on vacation) but can be a little bit flexible with dates.
space: Sorauren Avenue in the Roncesvalles neightbourhood; easy walk to restaurants, shops, streetcars and the Dundas West subway. One bedrooms with one bathroom including a parking spot. No pets allowed and absolutely no smoking allowed.

name: Elegant apartment in the heart of Toronto
summary: 1920's era gem, located in Rosedale just blocks from trendy Yorkville. 1 king bed,  1 kids room with crib and toddler bed + daybed and sectional for additional sleepers. Contemporary furnishings, sun filled large common rooms, 2000+ sq feet of space
space: Grand New York style apartment in heart of the city, blocks from Yorkville/Summerhill, Whole Foods TTC etc. Over 2000 sq feet of entertaining space, 2 beds (1 king, 1 kids room with crib and toddler bed) 1 bath, in suite laundry, hi speed internet, working fireplace, housekeeping service and a curated guide of all the best places to eat, drink and shop in our city. Building recently named "one of Toronto's most elegant" by Toronto Star architectural writer. Very desirable and discreet building. Truly modern luxury in historical setting. Rare opportunity as there is a perpetual waiting list to access this building.

name: Baldwin Village Downtown Apartment
summary: Lowrise building downtown apartment. Conveniently located walking distance from Toronto's downtown art, food, culture, shopping, nightlife and parks!  Steps away from various public transportation stops. Ideal for single travellers.
space: A great location right across from Kensington Market, Chinatown, the AGO, Queen Street shops, restaurants/cafes and College Street.  The apartment is right on the Spadina streetcar line for easy TTC access.  You can cut on transportation costs because this place is walking distance to great bars, clubs, movie theaters/TIFF screening locations, galleries and parks.   This is a two bedroom apartment currently available for shared occupancy.  The smaller of the two rooms includes a single bed (which can be expanded to a double), a desk and a work lamp. name: Big City Views from beautiful Queen West condo!
summary: My modern and bright condo is fully equipped to make for a very comfortable stay in the city. The location cannot be beat; close to a myriad of wonderful restaurants, bars and shops. Its park facing location makes for a quiet stay with spectacular views of the Toronto skyline.  Its close location to the streetcar stop and bike share program - make it easy to get around the city. I promise to make my home a wonderful place for your stay in TO! Let me know how I can help. Happy travels!!
space: 1-bedroom + den condo in the heart of downtown Toronto, steps away from the streetcar + bikeshare for easy access to all parts of the city. Unobstructed views of downtown.  The boutique building looks over Stanley park.  Bright and cheerful with floor to ceiling windows and a small balcony with dining table. Fully equipped kitchen with espresso machine & dishwasher.  Large living space with 42inch flatscreen with cable.  Bedroom opens up to balcony with a new queen mattress is extremely comfortable.  There is a den available for you to sit at the desk and work or if you prefer, can be converted with an air mattress into another sleeping area.  The bathroom has a a soaker tub available. Washer & dryer is also in the unit if you would like to use it. Free wifi & cable.  Feel free to use the gym downstairs also. Parking is also available upon request. name: Boutique Chic at Maple Leaf Square
summary: This is a private studio condo (no separate bedroom) ideal for one or two travelers in the throbbing heart of downtown Toronto. Amenities are abundant. The condo is extremely popular.  Please read full description below.
space: Welcome to the Boutique Chic studio condo in the heart of downtown Toronto.  This small, beautifully appointed apartment is perfectly situated at the award-winning Maple Leaf Square where your world is simply an elevator ride away. The condo is linked to Canada's busiest transit hub, Union Station, with direct access to the TTC subway system, GO transit, the express UP train to and from Pearson Airport, and Via Rail. The building is also directly connected to 27 km of underground shopping and restaurants through the Toronto's PATH system. The building's amenities feature an indoor and outdoor pool, state-of-the-art gym, sauna, billiards room, business rooms with wireless internet, party room, media room, and 24 hour security and concierge. Maple Leaf Square is home to a 40-thousand square foot Longo's supermarket, with ready-made meals-to-go, as well as an LCBO Liqour store, TD Bank, Starbucks, Real Sports Bar and Grill and the fine-dining restaurant, "e11even". space: Bonjour!  - right beside Davisville subway station - only 3 stops away from downtown - steps from restaurants, grocery stores, cinémas, coffee shops, dry cleaners, post office, pharmacies, shopping mall, a 5km nature/running trail, gym, ESL school, etc. - indoor heated pool on roof - sauna - huge rooftop terrasse open 24/7 with gorgeous 360 degree view of Toronto including the CN Tower - one futon double beds and one pull-out single bed  - unlimited wireless internet - cable tv - furnished balcony - air-conditioning in summer - 44" flat screen TV - board games, DVDs and a mini-ibrary of English and french books for you to enjoy! - well-lit and VERY clean! - laundry - street and cheap pay parking at your doorstep Think of it as a private, luxury hostel; one big happy family, although I am rarely home. name: Cosy room by Toronto's Danforth Ave
summary: PLEASE SEE *NOTE* CONSTRUCTION ALERT BELOW.  Cosy room available for female travellers in 100-year-old home, steps from Danforth's Greektown. Quiet, lovely treed neighbourhood & everything you need close by. A 7 min. walk to the Donlands subway stop means you can be downtown in half an hour!
space: *NOTE*:  CONSTRUCTION ALERT.  Sometime in the spring of 2020 (April?), the house next door to mine will be torn down and a new house will be built in its place.  The construction period, I anticipate, will go from spring 2020 to the end of fall/winter 2020 at the earliest. At times it could be extremely noisy being next to the construction, and at other times much less so.  Construction noise is allowed from 7 am to 7 pm Monday to Friday in the City of Toronto, and Saturday from 8 am to 7 pm.   AS A RESULT, between spring and December 2020, this rental would probably best suit someone who is going out everyday to a job, internship, school, etc., and is mainly out enjoying Toronto's sites on Saturdays.  Please feel free to ask if you have further questions, and I will update this note are more information becomes available.  *** In your room: desk, night table, single bed with duvet, window with curtains, bookcase, large wardrobe for hanging clothes, and it also has shelves for clothing

space: Perfect space for families!  3.5 bedroom (main: queen bed, 2nd: crib/double air mattress option, 3rd: single bed, 4th: double futon, low ceiling), 2 bathroom, semi-detached home, conveniently located a short walking distance from Bloor/Danforth subway line and Union-Pearson Express train (links airport to city). name: Cozy Room in Midtown Near Subway
space: This room is awesome and the location couldn't be better!  The apartment is right off of Davisville Avenue just off the Yonge line. The neighborhood is pedestrian friendly and downtown is at a walkable distance (about 30 min away), but you can take the subway and be downtown in 10 min. The area is filled with cafes, book shops, clothing stores, fine cheese shops, night clubs, restaurants etc. Davisville is really in the heart of Toronto, not far from all major art and sports venues, there is always something happening (check out the guidebook). It's a great place to be! The room in question is the living room (about 10' x 14'). We have a king size bed that comfortably fits 2 people. There's a desk and wifi if you need to work. The living room is large and bright with a balcony and great views of the city's east side.   In addition to the room, we provide clean towels, free wifi, free brochures and a free transit map showing all of the bus and train routes in the city, free Netflix to w

name: Bright Spacious 2Br Leslieville Home, Local Living
summary: This great two bedroom house has a warm feeling which will make you feel comfortable and right at home. It fits six people and is located in Leslieville, the coolest neighbourhood in Toronto. Enjoy a gourmet kitchen, back patio lounge, and easy access to transportation.
space: Recently renovated, open concept, fully furnished, family-friendly, 2 bedroom home. The master bedroom has a queen bed, which accommodates 2, the second bedroom has a double bed, which accommodates 2, and there is a thick and comfortable queen size inflatable air mattress (on request), which accommodates 2. There is 1 full bathroom with a claw foot tub and walk-in shower.  The bedrooms and bathroom are all on the 2nd floor. The photos in the listing are accurate, though I have newly painted walls and some of the art has changed since the photos were taken.

name: Private Suite 5 min. from Downtown
space: A private second-floor studio flat for visitors, academic professionals, artists and students visiting Canada.  Antique brass double bed, full closet and chest of drawers, private toilet & shower, galley food preparation area with Fridge, Microwave, Kettle & Toaster.  Wireless Internet.  Clean Interior.
description: A private second-floor studio flat for visitors, academic professionals, artists and students visiting Canada.  Antique brass double bed, full closet and chest of drawers, private toilet & shower, galley food preparation area with Fridge, Microwave, Kettle & Toaster.  Wireless Internet.  Clean Interior. Nestled in the middle of a quiet residential downtown neighbourhood on one of Toronto’s historic tree-lined streets, this fine home is but a few blocks walk to all amenities.  The house is close to Little Italy (5 mins walk), Kensington Market (15mins walk), Queen St W. (15 mins streetcar), Bloor St.(5 mins walk), Ossington (15 mins streetcar), and University of Toronto (15 mins walk). There are dozens of amazing restaurants, cafes and bars nearby on Harbord, College and Bloor . We are close to streetcars (3 minute walk to both College and Bathurst streetcars) and Subway (5 min walk to the Bloor/Bathurst station).

space: Welcome to Corktown district in Toronto (Downtown East). Nice, residential street but so close to the action and pulse of the city. Easy key access upon arrival for confirmed guests. Come and share my space in Toronto.   I am a non-smoker.  If you wish to smoke, only outside on the patio/balcony. My calendar is always current, even if it appears as "last update x days ago" which means I most likely have had no changes in that period. Wake up ready to start your day with fresh, hot coffee and the newspaper!  My house is a mixture of Spanish, Mediterranean and Latin. Yes, I love the sun THAT MUCH! 10 minutes to centre of town or less!  And a bike is included!!!! I speak English fluently and French (not fluent). In my kitchen is a plaque "mi casa es su casa".   GUESTS (there are no strangers for they are only people whom you have not yet met). HAVE FULL ACCESS TO THE HOUSE. Cook, relax, watch tv, put on some music, dance, LIVE!!! Lounge, dining area, patio, etc. QUICK TIPS: Canadians pay

Just steps away from the Bathurst Subway Station and the University of Toronto, Annex House is situated in the vibrant Annex neighbourhood. It is within walking distance to numerous restaurants, cafes, museums and downtown shopping. PLEASE NOTE THAT OUR CALENDARS ON THIS WEBSITE MAY NOT ALWAYS BE UPDATED. KINDLY ENQUIRE ABOUT OUR AVAILABILITY BEFORE BOOKING. Our studio apartments range in size from 300sf to 500sf. Each unit has private ensuite washroom, double/queen-sized bed, desk and chair, TV, telephone and kitchenette with fridge, microwave, coffee malker and eating utensils. FREE FOR OUR GUESTS:  •High-speed Wi-Fi Internet  •Cable TV  •Local phone calls  •Fresh linens & towels We offer optional weekly cleaning service. space: In one of the 3 towers right on Yonge and Bloor, on the 30th floor facing South & East, a great view for downtown Toronto... One large furnished room with a private bathroom for rent. The apartment is fully furnished including kitchen, bathrooms, living area, dining area and bedrooms. TV, DVD player and cable TV and sound system in living room.   The apartment is located in the same building of Metro, Yonge & Bloor subway station, and has direct indoor access to a few shopping malls, the Bay, Holt Renfrew, CIBC, Manulife Center, direct access to many food courts, major banks and fitness gym ( extreme fitnes and good life ), shoppers drugmart, post offices, LCBO, Rabba... all access from within the building to make this location one of the most convenient addresses in downtown Toronto.
